divs: Sighting DetailsThe principal witness was walking for exercise between 5:00 AM and 6:00 AM. Shesawa brightly glowing sphere about three times the size of the planet Venus. Shestopped a neighbor who was backing out her car to go to work, asking her to look at thestrange bright light. The neighbor looked briefly at the direction to which thewitness was pointing and then continued on to work. The first witness watchedthe ball of light for about seven minutes at which time she lost sight of it.
trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There were no other sightings in Miami on or around March 31st 2001
